messageBody:
Hi,

Would it be possible to have Assert.fail(message, exception) method
in future version of the junit. I see this to be very critical for
methods failing and resulting in exceptions. this way user could
simultaniously say what is related message resulting failure along
with the exact stack trace.

Also, junit does not give the cound of no of test cases passed.. it
says total, failed and errors only.. would be happy to see total
passed and its % to encourage people to work on fixing others.

Another need, which I had been badly looking for was no of asserts
which have been executed.. this tells me how much of auto testing
has been done.

i.e assertEquals() assertNotNull all these calls should have a way
report to total assertcounter.

Regards,
Raja Nagendra Kumar,
